name: The Best Hot Chocolate Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat milk and sugar in a saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves and mixture just comes to a gentle simmer. Remove from heat.

Meanwhile, chop chocolate, reserving some for garnish. Stir chopped chocolate and cocoa into milk until melted and smooth. Pour mixture into glasses. Top with whipped cream and reserved chocolate. Serve.
